content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The Sony MCC-1000MD has the highest light sensitivity on the market making it the best option for retinal surgery. It uses a standard C-mount, and is compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.

  • Full HD resolution (1080p)
  • High Dynamic Range (HDR)
  • 1/2.8″ 3-chip CMOS sensor
  • Standard C-mount
  • F20 light sensitivity (with high sensitivity setting)
  • HDMI, HD-SDI, and S video outputs
  • 6, 10, or 15 meter camera cable available

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”72744″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1574883346170{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Sony MCC-1000MD

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]If you are looking for a camera for retinal surgery or any other low light application the MCC-1000MD should be your first consideration. With the highest light sensitivity on the market, HDR compatibility, and native HDMI output the MCC-1000MD is a top performer among 1080p medical grade cameras.

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® adapters the MCC-1000MD can be configured to any magnification you prefer, with the option for optical zoom for the best video experience.

The full specifications for the MCC-1000MD can be found here.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Part # MCC-1000MD

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d540055-c35d”][vc_column_text]Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® video adapters.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3d0055-c35d”][vc_column_text]Sony C-mount cameras are class 1 devices, and are approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014a0055-c35d”][vc_column_text]Sony C-mount cameras include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
